trans-unit.source: Defines a condition with an associated set of actions to perform.
trans-unit.target: Define uma condição com um conjunto associado de acções a executar.

trans-unit.source: A Rule consists of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> and one or both <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: Uma regra é composta por um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>e um ou ambos os <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>coleções.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class using the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> classe utilizando o nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class using the name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rule" name="Rule" href=""></xref>, the rule condition, and a list of THEN actions.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> classe utilizando o nome do <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rule" name="Rule" href=""> </xref>, a condição de regra e uma lista de ações, em seguida.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects to evaluate whether the condition is true.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> objetos para avaliar se a condição for true.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class using the name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rule" name="Rule" href=""></xref>, the rule condition, a list of THEN actions, and a list of ELSE actions.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> classe utilizando o nome do <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rule" name="Rule" href=""> </xref>, a condição de regra, uma lista de ações, em seguida e uma lista de ações de ELSE.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects to evaluate if the condition is true.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> objetos para avaliar se a condição for true.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects to evaluate whether the condition is false.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> objetos para avaliar se a condição for false.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> should be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> deve ser avaliada.

trans-unit.source: When set to `false`, this property is similar to commenting out the rule.
trans-unit.target: Quando definido como `false`, esta propriedade é semelhante para comentar enviados a regra.

trans-unit.source: The default is `true`.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Rule should be evaluated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a regra deve ser avaliada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda da atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> que é idêntica a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> a avaliar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> a avaliar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma descrição do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A description of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma descrição do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> classes to perform in the ELSE case.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> classes para efetuar no caso de ELSE.

trans-unit.source: ElseActions typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, calls a method of the activity, or calls static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, ElseActions definido um valor de variável das propriedades da atividade, chama um método para a atividade ou chama os métodos estáticos em tipos em assemblagens referenciadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>faz com que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>para parar a execução e devolve controlo para o método de chamada.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifies a property or calls a method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>modifica uma propriedade ou chama um método.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>explicitamente indica que uma regra está a atualizar uma variável.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>

trans-unit.source: This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que a reavaliação de quaisquer regras afetadas.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> to perform in the ELSE case.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> efetuar no caso de ELSE.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> and the object passed as the parameter have the same value.
trans-unit.target: Determina se esta instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> e o objecto transmitido como parâmetro têm o mesmo valor.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare the current object to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto comparar o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: if the current object and obj are the same; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto atual e obj são os mesmos; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in which a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> should be run.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a ordem pela qual um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> deve ser executado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> classes that have a higher priority value are run before lower priority <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>classes que têm um valor de prioridade superior são executadas antes de prioridade mais baixa <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>classes.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>

trans-unit.source: Rules that have the same priority are run in the alphabetic order of their name properties.
trans-unit.target: As regras que têm a mesma prioridade são executadas pela ordem alfabética das respetivas propriedades de nome.

trans-unit.source: The Priority value can be positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: O valor de prioridade pode ser positivo ou negativo.

trans-unit.source: The default value for any <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> is 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido para qualquer <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>é 0.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the order in which a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> should be run.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica a ordem pela qual um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> deve ser executado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> can be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> pode ser reavaliadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReevaluationBehavior"></xref> indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> can be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReevaluationBehavior"> </xref> que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref> pode ser reavaliadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> classes to perform in the THEN case.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> classes para o caso, em seguida, efetuar.

trans-unit.source: ThenActions typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, call a method of the activity, or call static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente ThenActions definir um valor de variável das propriedades da atividade, chamar um método da atividade ou chamar os métodos estáticos em tipos em assemblagens referenciadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>faz com que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>para parar a execução e devolve controlo para o método de chamada.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>explicitamente indica que uma regra está a atualizar uma variável.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>

trans-unit.source: This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que a reavaliação de quaisquer regras afetadas.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> classes to perform in the THEN case.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> classes para o caso, em seguida, efetuar.
